launchAppletOnBoot.description:
Automatically Enable Blue Light Blocker
(On computer startup or whenever the applet is added to a panel.)
launchAppletOnBoot.tooltip:
Automatically Enable Blue Light Blocker
(On computer startup or whenever the applet is added to a panel.)

defaultTempValueOnBoot.tooltip: The color temperature value that will be applied on startup or when the applet is added to a panel.

defaultBrightnessPercentageValueOnBoot.tooltip: The brightness percentage value that will be applied on startup or when the applet is added to a panel.

enableAccessibleSliders.tooltip: Allows you interact with the sliders using the keyboard (Tab + arrow keys). If you do not require this, it is recommended to disable this feature for a better visual experience. This option DOES NOT affect performances.
